description: This Dart source file defines two stateless widget classes, NotesFiltersBar and WalletFiltersBar, for providing filter UI components in a Flutter application. The file contains UI controls for filtering notes and wallet entries, including search fields, toggle chips, date pickers, category inputs, and type dropdowns.

classes.name: NotesFiltersBar
classes.description: A widget rendering a search bar and a favorites toggle, suitable for the Notes tab.

classes.name: WalletFiltersBar
classes.description: A widget providing filtering controls for wallet entries, including date range, category, and type filters.

classes.name: _DateButton
classes.description: A private widget used within WalletFiltersBar for selecting dates.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for rendering the NotesFiltersBar or WalletFiltersBar widget.

methods.name: _DateButton._formatDate
methods.description: Helper method to format DateTime objects as 'YYYY-MM-DD'.
